item.description:
CW's Chops n Catch is a great restaurant serving local produce with Corey's delicious flair. Now doing a Newcastle Beer tasting + 4 course dinner for only $40.00 (plus tax and gratuity)!  Join me January 9th 2012 at 6:30 for Steamed Clams, Buffalo wings and salad bites, locally made gourmet Sausage mix grill & veggies or succulent Beef Stew, and CW's signature dessert.

The dinner will be accompanied by 4 Newcastle beers, two of which are new and and being previewed for the first time (not yet available for sale)!! So come and be one of the first to try them.  (If you are not a beer drinker, wine may be substituted)

If this Meetup is full, call 860 783-5545 and add yourself to the reservation, then RSVP "YES" to the Wait List stating you have "reserved a spot" and I will move you to the Attendees.

I am NOT collecting the $1.00 this time.  If you are one of the first 4 to RSVP "YES" you must attend, or my credit card will be charged a small fee for a "missed diner".

This is a fun way to start the New Year, hope to see you there.

- Betsy

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Let's toast the New Year at CW's Beer Tasting Dinner 1/9/12 6:30
